name: Wendy's Burger
description: The Cheeseburger Wendy's Burger is a classic fast food burger that packs a punch of flavor in every bite. Made with a juicy beef patty cooked to perfection, it's topped with melted American cheese, crispy lettuce, ripe tomato, and crunchy pickles..

name: Veggie Burger
description: Smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, and onion rings on a toasted sesame bun.

name: Chicken Burger
description: Sautéed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, and garlic aioli on a toasted potato bun.

name: Fried Chicken Burger
description: Beef patty topped with pepper jack cheese, fresh jalapeños, spicy mayo, and lettuce.

name: Bacon Melt Burger
description: Juicy beef patty layered with melted cheddar, smoky bacon, and tangy house sauce on a soft brioche bun.

name: Crispy Ranch Chicken Burger
description: Crispy chicken fillet with ranch mayo, lettuce, and melted Swiss cheese on a toasted potato bun.

name: BBQ Smokehouse Burger
description: Grilled Angus beef topped with BBQ sauce, crispy onions, and cheddar cheese on a sesame bun.

name: Spicy Inferno Burger
description: Beef patty with jalapeños, pepper jack cheese, chipotle mayo, and lettuce on a brioche bun.

name: Classic American Burger
description: Simple and timeless — beef patty, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, ketchup, and mustard.

name: Buffalo Crunch Chicken Burger
description: Crispy chicken drenched in buffalo sauce with cool ranch, lettuce, and tomato on a sesame bun.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: Grilled beef patty topped with sautéed mushrooms, melted Swiss, and garlic aioli on a toasted bun.

name: Southern Fried Burger
description: Crispy fried chicken, cheddar cheese, coleslaw, and honey mustard on a buttery bun.
